structure.unit: Shipping And Seamen, Harbors And Harbor Masters

law.catch_line: Order To Vessel To Brace Topsail Yards, Etc.
law.text: A vessel lying in a harbor or at a wharf or pier in a harbor shall, if so directed by the harbor master, cockbill the lower yards, brace the topsail yards fore and aft and rig in the jib-boom.
